# Self-Determination Theory

Determination

:   Will power to persist until accomplish the goals/objectives

In Education, motivation and engagement are two most discussed attributes of students, high motivation and high engagement are what educators looking for. However, there are much left unknown whether educators expectation is healthy.

Why do we need students to have motivation, they should have or we should induce. In the sense that motivation is more than let say 50% students responsibility is quite teacher-centric way of education. How on earth would the students have motivation
